testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlRampMeterPlanInventorySubscription dialog as an EC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.9.9 [Need to Share Ramp Metering Plans] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Metering Plan Information (NTRM 3.3.5.10.7.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N85R924_Publish_Metering_Plan_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N85R924_Publish_Metering_Plan_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Metering Plan Information (NTRM 3.3.5.10.7.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N85R925_Subscribe_to_Metering_Plan_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N85R925_Subscribe_to_Metering_Plan_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Authentication - Device Information (DeviceAuth) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R364_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported = ${TMDD_N85R364_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Operator Identifier - Device Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.1.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R365_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R365_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether External Center Organization - Device Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R366_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R366_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R367_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R367_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R368_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R368_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R369_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R369_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R370_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R370_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R371_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R371_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pattern Identifier Filter is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.1.1.3.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R373_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R373_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N85R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N85R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationMessage: ${PublicationMessage}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be performed within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationCount: ${PublicationCount}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Identify the Username expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Username: ${Username}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Identify the Password expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: Password: ${Password}
Step 21 CONFIGURE: Identify the Operator Identifier expected for authentication during this test. RECORD this information as: OperatorID: ${OperatorID}
Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}
Step 25 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionResponseMessage: ${SubscriptionResponseMessage}

Step 26 SUBSCRIPTION-OC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterPlanInventorySubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck USERNAME = Username PASSWORD = Password OPERATORID = OperatorID ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 27 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 27.1 VERIFY that a deviceInformationRequestMsg message was received.
Step 27.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message deviceInformationRequestMsg.
Step 27.3 VERIFY that a device-type data element exists within message deviceInformationRequestMsg.
Step 27.4 VERIFY that a device-information-type data element exists within message deviceInformationRequestMsg.
Step 27.5 VERIFY that a deviceInformationRequestMsg message was received.
Step 27.6 VERIFY that data element device-information-type is set to device plan.
Step 27.7 VERIFY that data element device-type is set to ramp meter.
Step 27.8 IF TMDD_N85R364_Authentication___Device_Information__DeviceAuth__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.8.1 VERIFY that an authentication data frame exists within message deviceInformationRequestMsg.
Step 27.9 IF TMDD_N85R365_Operator_Identifier___Device_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.9.1 VERIFY that an operator-id data element exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.authentication
Step 27.10 IF TMDD_N85R366_External_Center_Organization___Device_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.10.1 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message deviceInformationRequestMsg.
Step 27.11 IF TMDD_N85R367_Device_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.11.1 VERIFY that a device-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.12 IF TMDD_N85R368_Roadway_Network_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.12.1 VERIFY that a network-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.13 IF TMDD_N85R369_Link_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.13.1 VERIFY that a link-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.14 IF TMDD_N85R370_Route_Designator_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.14.1 VERIFY that a link-designator-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.15 IF TMDD_N85R371_Linear_Reference_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.15.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.16 IF TMDD_N85R373_Pattern_Identifier_Filter_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.16.1 VERIFY that a pattern-id-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame deviceInformationRequestMsg.device-filter
Step 27.17 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 27.18 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 27.19 POSTCONDITION: SUBSCRIPTION-OC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterPlanInventorySubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED SUBSCRIPTIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = SubscriptionResponseMessage

Step 27.20 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 27.20.1 PUBLICATION-OC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlRampMeterPlanInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N85R924_Publish_Metering_Plan_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONMESSAGE = PublicationMessage PUBLICATIONCOUNT = PublicationCount PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 27.20.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 27.20.2.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 27.20.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.20.2.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.20.2.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.20.2.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 27.20.2.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to PublicationErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 27.20.2.7 IF TMDD_N85R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 27.20.2.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 28 EXIT
